Post.title: It is mine and you cannot have it
Post.description: Living in a world where we constantly need to think twice before speaking to avoid saying something that might appear, it can be very useful to know why this might be considered offensive

Post.title: Suicide Squad
Post.description: A movie that many loved and many others hated is also the movie that introduced us to the best interpretation of Harley Quinn there will ever be, so it might be worth seeing it

Post.title: Tokyo Ghoul
Post.description: An anime that made me think about the importance of self-acceptance, and about dwelling with one's own demons to be able to survive
